text: int main ( ) { int i , j , n , t , s = 0 , arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } s = arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i - 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { s += arr [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
